title: How to co-stream the PC Gaming Show on June 11
description: Watch 55 game trailers featuring new announcements, updates, and exclusive interviews with developers on your stream.

title: Ubisoft is jumping into AI, with 'developers of all levels experimenting with the technology'
description: Ubisoft's latest financial report cited the power of generative AI technology on "creativity, workflows, and players’ experience."

title: Steam is ditching a Google tool that Valve says 'doesn't align' with its customer privacy approach
description: Game devs will no longer be able to use Google Analytics to track Steam page traffic.

title: Here's your short Diablo 4 lore primer before launch
description: Blizzard (and I) have you covered with a refresher on Lilith and Inarius's history with Sanctuary.

title: Lawmaker asks ChatGPT if the government should regulate AI, and the answer won't surprise you
description: We also learned it's possible to have a military drone select its own targets thanks to the power of AI.

title: My most anticipated co-op shooter just pivoted to an extraction shooter, and playtest signups are live
description: Following last year's delay, Arc Raiders will now be a PvPvE extraction shooter.

title: ChatGPT boss calls for a new government agency to keep AI companies in check
description: OpenAI's Sam Altman answered lawmakers' questions about the risks of AI and how it should be regulated.

title: Blizzard is scrapping Overwatch 2 co-op missions and hero progression: 'It's clear that we can't deliver on the original vision for PvE'
description: The co-op missions that Overwatch 2 was initially sold on are never happening.

title: NFT cockfighting game canned, but will buy back your cocks
description: How could such a visionary idea have failed?

title: Surprise, Skull and Bones won't actually be out 'early' this year after all
description: The long-overdue pirates game will be at the Ubisoft Forward showcase in June, but the actual release won't happen until later in the company's fiscal year.

title: Are Zelda players okay?
description: Korok torture seems to be the new Zelda pasttime. Welcome to sandbox freedom, Nintendo players.

title: Advertising watchdog slams Roblox because of paid-for influencers shilling Robux without disclosure 'children can understand'
description: "CARU recommended that Roblox ensure that advertisements are clearly and conspicuously identified as ads."

title: Ubisoft wants to sell you Ezio's 'digital soul' and yes, it's an NFT
description: New Assassin's Creed-themed collectibles live in little plastic cubes and also on the blockchain.

title: UK MPs question why the CMA blocked Microsoft's $68.7B Activision Blizzard deal, CMA says it won't be 'turning a blind eye to anti-competitive mergers'
description: "It would constrain how the market would evolve going forward."

title: The first computer to sing a song sounds more adorable than GLaDOS or HAL would have you believe
description: Old-school vocaloids do tend to generate a killer vibe thanks to pop culture, but the original voice synth sounds super cute.

title: Framework 13 Intel 13th Gen mainboard
description: An unnecessary upgrade, but talismanic of the progress the modular laptop company has made.

title: Call of Duty's 'worst map in all of videogames' is only there by mistake
description: Or maybe the best map?

title: Player trash talks 15 year-old opponent at fighting game tournament, the kid's mom incinerates this 'loser', and he backs off while apologising
description: Never disrespect someone in front of their mother.

title: Riot Games announces new CEO as it emerges the company will pay out over $100 million to 1,548 women to settle gender discrimination case
description: League of Lawyers.

title: Age of Empires 2's new DLC adds all of the first game's civs today
description: Don't call it a comeback, Rome's been here for years.

title: I'm a VR evangelist and even I baulk at the rumoured price of Apple's 'so good' VR headset
description: Shame on me for expecting anything less than $3,000.

title: WoW 10.1.5: Everything we know about World of Warcraft's next update
description: WoW Fractures in Time is expected to arrive this summer.

title: You can grab 500 hours of Mass Effect and Dragon Age for 20 bucks right now
description: The BioWare Mega Collection is usually $190, but it's 90% off at the moment.

title: Asus extends AM5 motherboard warranty to cover beta BIOSes and memory overclocking presets
description: Phew, if your CPU burns up you at least don't have to worry about buying another motherboard.

title: Nvidia is set to retire the venerable RTX 3060 Ti
description: A sure sign the RTX 4060 Ti release is imminent.

title: Fully unlocked RX 7900 XTX very nearly matches RTX 4090 performance
description: It takes a hardware mod and serious power though.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #696: Tuesday, May 16
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.
